description:
A compact, efficient panel to keep your USB powered devices going anywhere under the sun. Equipped with a standard USB port, like you’d find on your computer, the Nomad 10 solar panel works with most USB-powered device and many Goal Zero powerbanks.

  • Charges most USB powered devices, USB port: 5V, up to 1.5A (7.5W max)
  • Works with Goal Zero Flip, Sherpa, Guide and Venture series powerbanks
  • Charge times range from 2.5-5 hours for a Flip 12 (3.6V, 3350 mAh battery) to 6–12 hours for a Flip 36 (3.6V, 10,050mAh battery)
  • Kickstand helps you find the perfect angle for optimal solar power
  • Unfolded dimensions: 24 x 37 x 2 cm
  • Monocrystalline panel rated at 10W
name: Goal Zero Nomad 10 Solar Panel
